New Records: Trae Young hit a halfcourt buzzer beater to win the game
Key Match Events: Trae Young hit a halfcourt buzzer beater to win the game
Collin Sexton tied the game with a three-pointer
Bogdan Bogdanovic hit a big shot to put Atlanta ahead 113-112
Walker Kessler got a putback dunk that gave Utah a 114-113 lead
De'Andre Hunter hit a three-pointer to give Atlanta the lead yet again 116-114
Pre-Game Insights: The Hawks were on a three-game losing streak and were without their emerging star Jalen Johnson
The Hawks still had the best player on the floor with Trae Young
Post-Match Reflections: The win was a big one for the Hawks, who don't play particularly well without Johnson
The Hawks wrap up their long road trip with a Thursday night game vs Phoenix
Miscellaneous Highlights: Freezing temperatures have been sweeping across the city of Atlanta this week
The Hawks finished the game shooting 48% from the field and 41% from three
Utah got a great performance from star forward Lauri Markkanen tonight and it nearly got them the win
Markkanen scored 35 points on 8-15 shooting from three point range
